items.sentence: You should know better than to ask a lady her age.
I would think that Tom would appreciate your help.
You\'re not allowed to have pets in this building.
Both my parents came to see me off at the airport.
When I was a child, I played catch with my father.
Tom showed Mary the money he had in his briefcase.
Tom signed the papers that Mary asked him to sign.
I wish Tom wouldn\'t sing so loudly late at night.
Tom would never wear a coat that looked like that.
Tom takes the trash out every day at six o\'clock.
You had bacon and eggs for breakfast, didn\'t you?
Tom doesn\'t want Mary to go anywhere without him.
Tom is going to be upset if Mary doesn\'t do that.
Tom is going to hurt himself if he\'s not careful.
I didn\'t know I was adopted until I was thirteen.
I didn\'t want to say anything in Tom\'s presence.
Tom and Mary meet in downtown Boston once a month.
Tom bought each of his children a yellow umbrella.
I have several friends who used to live in Boston.
What\'s your favorite Michael Jackson music video?
It\'s not too late to tell Mary that you love her.
Mary\'s new boyfriend is much younger than she is.
Tom sensed that things might be getting dangerous.
How much money did you spend on your last holiday?
Tom could swim like a fish before he turned eight.
Tom did fairly well on the test he took yesterday.
I didn\'t know Tom was living with Mary\'s family.
Tom never told me he was having suicidal thoughts.
Tom never wanted to give up, but he had no choice.
Tom noticed that John and Mary were holding hands.
Tom noticed that someone was standing behind Mary.
The kitchen always smells good when Tom is around.
We stayed together in Boston for a couple of days.
Tom likes to listen to music while he\'s studying.
You\'re not going to believe what happened to Tom.
You\'re not satisfied with these results, are you?
You\'re not the only one Tom has cheated, are you?
Can you recommend a good place to eat Korean food?
Why did you think that I didn\'t enjoy doing that?
Why don\'t you just come by my place after school?
We came to the conclusion that he should be fired.
What would your friends think if they saw you now?
Tom ordered a large double cheeseburger and fries.
Tom overslept and missed the bus he usually rides.
Tom picked up his guitar and headed for the stage.
Tom planned to visit Mary the first chance he got.
Tom knew who I was trying to get to join our team.
Tom lay awake for a long time thinking about Mary.
I took my shoes off and threw them out the window.
I can\'t remember what we were doing at that time.
